detectors.description:
SafeMath.sub(uint256,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#30-33) has assert violation
	Assert violations:
	- assert(bool)(b <= a) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#31)

StandardToken (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#96-162) inherits the contract, there is a conflict between state variables and functions
	Conflicting functions and state variables:
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#5)
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#70-82)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#6)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#7)
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#84-86)
	- BasicToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#49-51)

detectors.description:
totalSupply() should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#49-51)
	- ERC20Basic.totalSupply() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#5)

balanceOf(address) should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#84-86)
	- ERC20Basic.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#6)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#70-82)
	- ERC20Basic.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#7)

totalBurned() should be declared external:
	- BasicToken.totalBurned() (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#53-55)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#142-144)
	- ERC20.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#90)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- ERC20.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#92)
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/BasicToken__6.sol#136-140)
